verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon Gittith, <S%H1665><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah. <S%H7141><s%> How <S%H4100><s%> amiable <S%H3039><s%> are your tabernacles, <S%H4908><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts! <S%H6635><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> longs, <S%H3700><s%> yes, <S%H1571><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> faints <S%H3615><s%> for the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> and my flesh <S%H1320><s%> cries <S%H7442><s%> out for the living <S%H2416><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>

Yes, <S%H1571><s%> the sparrow <S%H6833><s%> has found <S%H4672><s%> an house, <S%H1004><s%> and the swallow <S%H1866><s%> a nest <S%H7064><s%> for herself, where <S%H834><s%> she may lay <S%H7896><s%> her young, <S%H667><s%> even <S%H853><s%> your altars, <S%H4196><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> my King, <S%H4428><s%> and my God. <S%H430><s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> are they that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in your house: <S%H1004><s%> they will be still <S%H5750><s%> praising <S%H1984><s%> you. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> whose strength <S%H5797><s%> is in you; in whose heart <S%H3824><s%> are the ways <S%H4546><s%> of them.

Who passing <S%H5674><s%> through the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Baca <S%H1056><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> it a well; <S%H4599><s%> the rain <S%H4175><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> fills <S%H5844><s%> the pools. <S%H1293><s%>
They go <S%H3212><s%> from strength <S%H2428><s%> to strength, <S%H2428><s%> every one of them in Zion <S%H6726><s%> appears <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H413><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>
O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer: <S%H8605><s%> give ear, <S%H238><s%> O God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Behold, <S%H7200><s%> O God <S%H430><s%> our shield, <S%H4043><s%> and look <S%H5027><s%> on the face <S%H6440><s%> of your anointed. <S%H4899><s%>

For a day <S%H3117><s%> in your courts <S%H2691><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than a thousand. <S%H505><s%> I had rather <S%H977><s%> be a doorkeeper <S%H5605><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of my God, <S%H430><s%> than to dwell <S%H1752><s%> in the tents <S%H168><s%> of wickedness. <S%H7562><s%>

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is a sun <S%H8121><s%> and shield: <S%H4043><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> and glory: <S%H3519><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> thing will he withhold <S%H4513><s%> from them that walk <S%H1980><s%> uprightly. <S%H8549><s%>
O LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> that trusts <S%H982><s%> in you.
